name: Sun West Mortgage Company
description: At Sun West Mortgage Company, Played a pivotal role in AngelAI's success, spearheading the chat-based loan application feature. Impacted 20M Superbowl users, achieving a remarkable 16x user growth. Engineered performance enhancements via code splitting and lazy loading, optimizing efficiency.

name: Formation
description: Chosen for exclusive Fellowship providing individualized instruction from leading engineers. Leading a team of 6, we embarked on a unique project - building a Twitter-like platform using only emojis. This endeavor not only taught junior developers essential programming skills but also showcased my ability to effectively mentor and support peer learners. Additionally, I had the opportunity to collaborate with senior developers from renowned tech giants like Facebook and Google on complex tasks, further honing my collaboration skills.

name: Thumbstopper
description: At Thumbstopper, I successfully integrated back-end services and server-side logic to create a high-performance platform. I also ensured smooth front-end integration and seamless integration of user-facing elements. Overcoming architectural challenges, I implemented the MVC design patterns and utilized PHP web frameworks to optimize the system's performance. Additionally, I employed front-end technologies like Vue.js and object-oriented PHP programming to enhance the user experience. Furthermore, I efficiently managed and accessed SQL databases to store and retrieve data.
